column4: i need to install gettext-devel for some application i want to compile
wwhere should i get it from?
google gives me nothing but RPM links
ubuntu is not a rpm disotr. there are no -devel packages
what should i do then when i need the devel package? is the normal gettext and gettext-base enough?
, then how should i install gettext-devel ?
you don't since it doesn't exist. I told you what to do
what file (header) do you need exactly?
ahaaaa, so it IS enough to have gettext and gettext-base :-)
in the future: all dev packages end with -dev
but there is no -dev package from gettext !
yes, mea culpa. just saw that
ok so its not needed if there is no -dev package?
probably not. I actually don't know. I asked you something you didn't answer
i think he didn't mean it that way, his english doesn't sound native to me
